name: Little Tree Plant
description: Biophytum sensitivum, commonly known as Little Tree Plant or Sensitive Plant, is a fascinating small herbaceous plant native to tropical Asia and Africa. It features a palm-like appearance with a single stem topped by a rosette of pinnate leaves that resemble a miniature palm tree. The leaves are highly sensitive and fold down when touched, shaken, or at night (nyctinastic movement), similar to Mimosa pudica but in a more compact form. The plant produces small yellow flowers with pink or purple centers. It's an annual or short-lived perennial that adds unique interest to terrariums with its sensitive leaf movements and palm-like appearance. The plant thrives in warm, humid conditions with filtered light.
careTips: Provide bright, indirect light - avoid direct sun
Keep soil consistently moist but well-draining
Leaves fold when touched or at night - this is normal
Can be grown as annual or short-lived perennial
